name: CreateReferenceTableUpload
description:
Create a reference table upload for bulk data ingestion.

Use this tool to initiate the creation of a reference table upload in Datadog, facilitating bulk data ingestion for analytics or monitoring purposes.

parameters.name: file_upload_headers
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the headers of the file to upload for the reference table.

value_schema.description: The headers of the file to upload.

parameters.name: upload_part_count
parameters.description: Specify the number of parts in the upload. Used for multipart uploads.

value_schema.description: The number of parts in the upload.

parameters.name: part_size_bytes
parameters.description: The size of each part in the upload in bytes. For multipart uploads (part_count > 1), all parts except the last one must be at least 5,000,000 bytes. For single-part uploads, any size is allowed.

value_schema.description: The size of each part in the upload in bytes. For multipart uploads (part_count > 1), all parts except the last one must be at least 5,000,000 bytes. For single-part uploads (part_count = 1), any size is allowed.

parameters.name: reference_table_name
parameters.description: The name of the reference table for the upload.

value_schema.description: The name of the reference table.

parameters.name: upload_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the upload process in Datadog.

parameters.name: upload_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type for the upload. Must be set to 'upload'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.headers
parameters.description: The headers of the file to upload.

value_schema.description: The headers of the file to upload.

parameters.name: data.attributes.part_count
parameters.description: The number of parts in the upload.

value_schema.description: The number of parts in the upload.

parameters.name: data.attributes.part_size
parameters.description: The size of each part in the upload in bytes. For multipart uploads (part_count > 1), all parts except the last one must be at least 5,000,000 bytes. For single-part uploads (part_count = 1), any size is allowed.

value_schema.description: The size of each part in the upload in bytes. For multipart uploads (part_count > 1), all parts except the last one must be at least 5,000,000 bytes. For single-part uploads (part_count = 1), any size is allowed.

parameters.name: data.attributes.table_name
parameters.description: The name of the reference table.

value_schema.description: The name of the reference table.
